featured.text: While early zoos put emphasis on displaying as many unusual creatures as possible, most modern zoos now focus on conservation and education.
Sea life can get sucked into desalination plants, killing small ocean creatures like baby fish and plankton, upsetting the food chain.
Most people probably don’t feel sympathy for these endangered creatures, but they do need protecting.
We want to believe in fantastic creatures in imaginary lands.

other.text: According to the passage, which of the following is true about an earworm? (A) It is a creature living inside our ears.
Most people feel disgusted at the sight of these bulky, slow-moving creatures.
Many children were upset to hear about the __38__ death of these wonderful sea creatures and decided to help __39__ them.

definition.zh_def: 生物；生物體，特別是指動物或神話中的生物。
definition.en_def: A living being, especially an animal or a mythical being.
definition.example: The forest is home to many strange and wonderful creatures.
